title: Attendance Portal
description: A web application for tracking student attendance using ReactJS, Node.js, and MySQL. It allows faculty to mark attendance and students to view their attendance records.

title: Inventory Management (BestShop)
description: A platform for managing inventory in a retail environment, built using ReactJS, Node.js, and MySQL. It includes features for tracking stock levels, adding products, and managing orders.

title: E-Learning Platform
description: An online platform for e-learning with course management, quizzes, and student tracking features. It allows students to enroll in courses and complete quizzes, with performance tracking.

title: Travel Dot
description: A travel booking platform that allows users to search for destinations, book flights, and hotels. Built with ReactJS and Node.js for an intuitive user experience and smooth interaction.
